page.title: 19Political Structure
page.content: There is a 4 fold system of democratic government in Warmingham.At the lowest tier there is the{Parochial Church Cou {ncil }which elected by the Church goer s of Warmingham.This meets at irregula r intervals in the school.This governs church affairs.{The Parish Council }is a lay Council governing limited aspect s of community life,having the right to levy a penny rate and to subsidise local activities to a limited degree. {The Borough Council }of Crewe represen ts the first tier of effective power. Councillors are elected for 4 year ter ms of office but,unlike nationally ele cted officials,only half the councillo rs stand for election at a time so loc al elections are held every 2 years. {The National Government }is elected fo r 4 year term in office but it is rare for any Government to last out a full term.There are now 3 main parties.
